Question: Zhongshan City Jixin Core Lock Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhongshan City Jixin Core Lock Co., Ltd

Product 1: Cylinder/Core Lock

 - High production capacity: 12 million sets per year
 - Expertise in cylinder and lock body manufacturing
 - Rated as "China's Safest Lock Cylinder"

Product 2: Smart Lock

 - Integration with mobile apps
 - Customization options available
 - Supported by a team of skilled R&D engineers

Product 3: Electronic Padlock

Product 4: Key Box

- 被评为“中国最安全的锁芯”

- 与移动应用程序集成
- 可定制的选项
